Register Today! 2011 TriTechs' Imc Solutions - Customer Golf Tournament
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
The Imc Golf Tournament has been revived! We hope that you can join us for a fabulous day of golf, refreshments, contests and prizes. Space is limited - reserve your spot by clicking on the "Register Now" button below to start the registration process.
WHEN: Wednesday, October 5, 2011
WHERE: Highfields Golf & Country Club 150 Magill Drive (off Route 122) Grafton, Massachusetts
TIME: 11:00 AM - Registration Begins Noon - Shotgun Start 5:00 PM - Dinner
FORMAT: Scramble
COST: $75.00 per person
INCLUDES: Greens Fees, Cart, Contests, Prizes & Dinner
DRESS CODE: Soft spikes required, collared shirts preferred; No blue jeans, tank tops, tee shirts or cut-offs at any time
PAYMENT: Check Payable to "TriTech Software Systems" and mail to: Information Management Corporation Attn: David Bell 13 Centennial Dr. North Grafton, MA 01536
QUESTIONS? Please Contact: David Bell PH: (774) 239-3722 Email: David.Bell@TriTech.com
REGISTER: http://offers.tritech.com/CustomerGolfTournament_100411_Registration.html
